import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import jsSha from 'jssha'; class Beneficiary extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state ={ acc: '', name: '', bank: '', accNum: '', accType: '', benRef: '', ownRef: '', email: '', address: '', } this.onChangeAcc = this.onChangeAcc.bind(this) this.onChangeBank = this.onChangeBank.bind(this) this.onChangeAccType = this.onChangeAccType.bind(this) } onChangeAcc(event) { this.setState ({ acc: event.target.value }) } onChangeBank(event) { this.setState ({ bank: event.target.value }) } onChangeAccType(event) { this.setState ({ accType: event.target.value }) } render () { return (

3. Proof of Payment

Addressed To: {this.setState({address: e.target.value.trim()})}} value={this.state.address} />

Please note

Your payment may take up to 24 hours to reflect on Bank of the Sun accounts, and up to 2 business days with other banks.
